name: near-api-as
description: gormantec implementation of assembly script for Near API.

scripts.asbuild: npm run asbuild:untouched && npm run asbuild:optimized && npm run asbuild:releasewww
scripts.webpack: npm run asbuild:releasewww && npx webpack && cp -f ./dist/main.js ../gcode/js/near-api-as.js && cp -R -f ./package.json ../gcode/dist/near-api-as && cp -R -f ./assembly/* ../gcode/dist/near-api-as/assembly && cp -f ./dist/near-api-as.wasm ../gcode/modules/near-api-as.wasm && npm run serve-demo

author: gormantec
